articles.author: Ludwig Burger, John Revill
articles.title: Roche buys U.S. rights to Roivant bowel disease drug in $7.1 billion deal - Reuters.com
articles.description: Switzerland's Roche (ROG.S) has agreed to pay an initial $7.1 billion to Roivant (ROIV.O) and Pfizer <…
articles.content: ZURICH/FRANKFURT, Oct 23 (Reuters) - Switzerland's Roche (ROG.S) has agreed to pay an initial $7.1 billion to Roivant (ROIV.O) and Pfizer (PFE.N) for rights to a new inflammatory bowel disease drug, … [+3364 chars]
